episodes.name: A Hero’s Journey: The Making of Percy Jackson and the Olympians
episodes.overview: Being a demigod isn't easy... and neither is filling the shoes of beloved characters in a massive television series. While embodying characters on a quest, Walker, Leah, and Aryan embark on an epic adventure of their own. Alongside a passionate cast and crew, follow these three young heroes on the set of "Percy Jackson and the Olympians" as they step into worlds fit for gods, battle unforgettable creatures, and perform legendary stunts. Oh, and they still have to go to school. Produced by Evolve Studios, this journey full of challenges and growth uncovers the magic behind-the-Mist.

episodes.name: I Accidentally Vaporize My Pre-Algebra Teacher
episodes.overview: Expelled from school, Percy Jackson unravels who he is, confronting a world of gods and monsters.

episodes.name: I Become Supreme Lord of the Bathroom
episodes.overview: Percy finds his place at Camp Half Blood, where he learns just how special his origins may be.

episodes.name: We Visit the Garden Gnome Emporium
episodes.overview: Percy sets off on the quest to return Zeus’ master bolt and stop a war between the gods.

episodes.name: I Plunge to My Death
episodes.overview: Our heroes search for a refuge in St Louis, and come face to face with the mother of all monsters.

episodes.name: A God Buys Us Cheeseburgers
episodes.overview: The quest deepens as Percy, Annabeth, and Grover are tasked with a favor from a fearsome opponent.

episodes.name: We Take a Zebra to Vegas
episodes.overview: Percy, Annabeth, and Grover must resist the alluring draw of a casino that feels outside of time.

episodes.name: We Find Out the Truth, Sort Of
episodes.overview: Our heroes journey across the Underworld, and bargain for their safety with the god of the dead.

episodes.name: The Prophecy Comes True
episodes.overview: Mount Olympus beckons... and Percy must face his greatest battle yet.

episodes.name: I Play Dodgeball with Cannibals
episodes.overview: Percy, Annabeth, and Tyson race to defend Camp Half-Blood from dangerous forces.

episodes.name: Demon Pigeons Attack
episodes.overview: Percy and Annabeth contend with a new activities director as they try to locate Grover.

episodes.name: We Board the Princess Andromeda
episodes.overview: Aboard a cruise ship, our heroes struggle to differentiate friend from foe.

episodes.name: Clarisse Blows Up Everything
episodes.overview: Quests collide as our crew voyages into the perilous Sea of Monsters.

episodes.name: We Check In to C.C.'s Spa and Resort
episodes.overview: Percy and Annabeth must confront their flaws at a resort sanctuary.

episodes.name: I Go Down with the Ship
The Fleece Works Its Magic Too Well
